content.en: Enhanced frequency estimation: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the accuracy of frequency estimation in the presence of noise and interference. These algorithms, such as the HE approach, the four-parameter sine-fit algorithm, and the interpolated discrete Fourier transform (IpDFT) algorithm, aim to enhance the performance of frequency estimation under low signal-to-noise ratios and other challenging conditions. By utilizing advanced mathematical techniques and interpolation methods, these algorithms offer more precise and reliable frequency estimation for applications in fields like signal processing and image analysis.
content.da: Forbedret frekvensestimation: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af frekvensestimation i nærvær af støj og interferens. Disse algoritmer, såsom HE-metoden, den fireparameter-sinuspassende algoritme og den interpolerede diskrete Fourier-transformationsalgoritme (IpDFT), sigter mod at forbedre ydeevnen af frekvensestimation under lave signal-støj-forhold og andre udfordrende betingelser. Ved at anvende avancerede matematiske teknikker og interpolationsmetoder, tilbyder disse algoritmer mere præcis og pålidelig frekvensestimation til anvendelse inden for områder som signalbehandling og billedanalyse.
